OP05-001.name: Sabo OP05-001

OP05-002.effect: [Activate: Main] [Once Per Turn] You may trash 1 {Revolutionary Army} type card from your hand: Up to 3 of your {Revolutionary Army} type Characters or Characters with a [Trigger] gain +3000 power during this turn.

OP05-005.effect: [On Play] If your Leader has the {Revolutionary Army} type, give up to 1 of your opponent's Leader or Character cards −1000 power during this turn.
